Courses.title: Complete Music Theory
Courses.description: A comprehensive course covering all aspects of music theory, from basic scales to advanced harmonics.

Courses.title: Guitar for Beginners
Courses.description: Learn the basics of playing the guitar, including chords, strumming patterns, and simple songs.

Courses.title: Advanced Vocal Techniques
Courses.description: Enhance your vocal abilities with advanced techniques and exercises designed for experienced singers.

Courses.title: Introduction to Music Production
Courses.description: Discover the essentials of music production, including software, recording, and mixing techniques.

Courses.title: Piano Masterclass
Courses.description: Join our masterclass to improve your piano skills, covering advanced pieces and performance techniques.

Courses.title: Songwriting Essentials
Courses.description: Learn the art of songwriting, from creating melodies to writing impactful lyrics.

Courses.title: Drumming Basics
Courses.description: Get started with drumming by learning basic rhythms, techniques, and simple drum patterns.

Courses.title: Jazz Improvisation
Courses.description: Learn how to improvise in jazz, including scales, chords, and soloing techniques.
